name: stylish NightMode
description:
1.自定义的编辑器夜间模式
2.将编辑器的内容改为适合夜间使用且代码样式还原cscode
3.如果发现bug或者改进建议欢迎给我留言
additional_info:
1. Custom editor night mode
2. Change the contents of the editor to fit for night use and restore CSCode with code style
3. If you find any bugs or Suggestions for improvement, please feel free to leave me a message
